attributes.action: Speed camera's have been used with illegal road signs in the UK. Refund Drivers.
attributes.additional_details: Investigations have found at www.bentcop.boards.net that unlawfull illegal road signage has been endemic in the UK & unsed to mislead drivers. It has been dangerous and deceptive. This must have a public enquiry. Also the cameras are a nuisance to driving and can be removed by section 149 of the Highways act 1980 chapter 66 because they have been an obstruction to driving in conjunction with illegal road signage. The Police & Councils wont admit it. The Government must admit it & refund drivers
attributes.background: The www.bentcop.biz petitions campaign has found unlawfull and illegal road signage used with enforcement cameras across the UK. The Government must admit this, investigate and refund drivers who have been prosecuted unlawfully. The speed cameras are a nuisance and obstruction. Remove them all.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
